All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Add_Album
Controls the "Add_Album" stage This class manages the addition of an album to the user's collection.
Add_Photo
Controls the "Add_Photo" stage This class manages the addition of a photo to an album.
Add_Tag
Controls the "Add_Tag" stage This class manages the addition of a tag to a photo.
Add_User
Controls the "Add_User" stage This class manages the addition of a new user.
Album
Class representation of an Album Object Represents a collection of photos with associated metadata.
AlbumsController
Controls the "Albums" stage
Controller
Class Representation of a Controller object This class serves as the base controller for the JavaFX application.
Copy_Photo
Controls the "Copy_Photo" stage This class handles copying a photo from one album to another.
Edit_Album
Controls the "Edit_Album" stage This class handles editing an existing album's name.
Edit_Caption
Controls the "Edit_Caption" stage This controller manages the functionality to edit the caption of a photo.
LoginController
Controls the "Login" stage This controller manages the login functionality.
Manage_Users
Controls the "Manage_Users" stage
Move_Photo
Controls the "Move_Photo" stage This controller facilitates the moving of a photo from one album to another.
Photo
Class Representation of a Photo object
Photos
Main class for the Photo Management Application.
PhotosController
Controls the "Photos" stage Manages photo-related actions such as adding, deleting, and editing photos in the selected album.
Search_Photo
Controls the "Search_Photo" stage Handles user interactions and search functionalities Displays search results based on user input parameters Manages navigation between different stages
StageManager
Manages the creation of JavaFX stages dynamically.
Tag
Represents a tag associated with a photo, consisting of a type and a value.
User
Represents a user in the photo application.
